resources.string:
1. All options must be correct in a question requiring more than one answer
 
2. Questions can only be submitted after reaching the last question
 
3. Cycle through the questions by using the "Next" and "Previous" buttons
 
4. Questions that require a text input should be answered in Uppercase or Lowercase
 
5. A single space must be left after each word for questions requirinq meaning of abbrevations
The Android operating system is known as a distribution of which operating system
Which of the following are related to the internet technology(pick three)
What is the name of the device shown in the picture below
What is the full meaning of LAN in IT terminology
What is the full meaning of ISP in IT terminology
